module.caption: NVM - Non-Volatile Memory
module.info: Driver for the SAM D20 Non-Volatile Memory controller. Provides a unified interface for the erasing, reading and writing of data to and from the various non-volatile memories of the device, including executable FLASH memory and user configuration pages.
This document describes how to use the Non-Volatile Memory Controller on the SAM D20, both the ASF driver and the peripheral itself.
